pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ansible-mdgen[![<CircleCI>](https://circleci.com/gh/murphypetercl/ansible-mdgen.svg?style=svg)](https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/murphypetercl/ansible-mdgen?branch=main)Ansible-mdgen is a package used to auto generate documentation for an ansible role.## To install```pip install ansible-mdgen```## To runCall ansible-mdgen passing in the path to the role```ansible-mdgen <path_to_role>```## DocumentationSee [here](https://murphypetercl.github.io/ansible-mdgen/) for full documentation.## CreditsThe idea for this project is based on (and includes some code from) [ansible-autodoc](https://github.com/AndresBott/ansible-autodoc) by Andres Bott so credit to him for his work.
